subject: Tennis
Philanthropy
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Andre Agassi, now 39, will be honored along with David Robinson, Mia Hamm and Doug Flutie on opening night of the U.S. Open for the charitable works of their retirement years.
snippet: Andre Agassi, now 39, will be honored along with David Robinson, Mia Hamm and Doug Flutie on opening night of the U.S. Open for the charitable works of their retirement years.
